example.eg: He was rather disturbed by the images of the war.  I am rather annoyed by your attitude.
example.egtrans: 这些战争图片颇有点让他心神不宁。你的态度让我相当气恼。

example.eg: I know you wanted to see that film, but I'd rather see this one.
example.egtrans: 我知道你想看那本电影，但是我宁愿看这一本。

dsense.name: rather do [sth] than do [sth], rather do [sth] than [sth]

example.eg: I'd rather watch a documentary than read a book.
example.egtrans: 比起读书，我更愿意看纪录片。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 更愿意做某事而不喜欢做某事, 比起...宁愿做某事

example.eg: I'd rather a badly paid job that I love than a well-paid one that I hate.
example.egtrans: 我宁可少挣一点钱，做自己喜欢的工作，不愿意干讨厌的高薪工作。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 想要...而不是, 比...更想要

example.eg: I'll have wine rather than beer with my dinner.
example.egtrans: 晚餐我想喝啤酒，不想喝红酒。

example.eg: The movie is more of a thriller rather than a horror film.
example.egtrans: 这部电影不算是恐怖片，更像是惊悚片。

example.eg: He argues that good is rather to be found than bad, at least in most people.
example.egtrans: 他认为，人性善良之处比邪恶之处更多，至少对于大多数人来说是如此。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 更真实地，更切实地, 更准确地说，更确切地说

example.eg: It appears not to be generosity; rather, it is greed.
example.egtrans: 这似乎并非慷慨，正相反，这是贪婪。

example.eg: Would I like another slice of that delicious cake?  Rather!
example.egtrans: 那么好吃的蛋糕，还用问吗？当然是再来一块！

trans_examp.trans_cn: 的确, 确实, 当然

dsense.name: better you than me (US), rather you than me (UK)
dsense.guideword: (I would not like to be in your position)

trans_examp.trans_cn: 幸亏是你而不是我, 还好是你不是我
更准确地说, 更确切地说

example.eg: He seems rather young to be applying for this job.
I would rather you simply told the truth, instead of seeking to excuse yourself.
example.egtrans: 我宁愿你告诉我事实，而不是为自己找借口。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 宁可要，宁愿, 更喜欢, 更想要
宁可要, 更喜欢, 更想要

dsense.name: would rather not, had rather not

example.eg: I'd rather not go to Spain again this year for our holidays.
